title: oprah.eckhart.tolle.webcast.E04
description:
A video in Ipod format (.m4v) of Oprah and Eckhart Tolle discussing Tolle&#039;s book, "A New Earth".
This is the fourth of 10 video chapters she&#039;s doing.  


Sourced from this page: http://www.oprah.com/obc_classic/webcast/archive/archive_download.jsp
MP3 format and transcript available at the link above.

This file can be viewed on VLC and probably other players as well. <a href=" http://www.videolan.org/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.videolan.org/</a>	

This is the smaller vid ~500MB of the two available.
